context.title: CMSIS - New Project
context.description: The project wizard helps you throug the first steps in creating a new CMSIS project.

context.title: CMSIS - First Time Device Selector
context.description: The device selection defines essential tool settings such as compiler controls, the memory layout for the linker, and the Flash programming algorithms. The view shows properties of the selected device. Refer to related links below for details. The Search field narrows the device list as you type. * - wild character for strings. ? - place holder for one character.

context.title: CMSIS - Code Template
context.description: The code template wizard helps you to create a source file containing function templates for the respective Software Component. Click on the Component to add the user code.

context.title: CMSIS - Property
context.description: The RTE property page shows you the property of the RTE component.
